Title: Multiple Cross-Site Scripting vulnerabilities in frontend
Description: Failing to properly encode editor input, several frontend components are susceptible to Cross-Site Scripting, allowing authenticated editors to inject arbitrary HTML.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.16, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.6.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.16 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.6.1
